images.alt_text: AI-selected This destination image will visually represent French cuisine and culture, featuring an elegant table setting with French delicacies and wine, emphasizing gastronomy.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to the campaign, enhancing the call-to-action for potential travelers.
AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and discounts related to the campaign, enhancing the call-to-action for potential travelers.
AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header of the email to reinforce brand identity and recognition.
AI-selected This background pattern will enhance the overall aesthetic of the email, creating a vibrant and elegant atmosphere that aligns with the summer theme.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of France in summer
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and elegant, showcasing iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting summer in France with romantic sunsets and culinary experiences

assetRequirements.purpose: highlighting the cultural and gastronomic aspects of France
assetRequirements.visual_style: sophisticated imagery of French cuisine and wine tours
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the culinary delights and cultural richness of France

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Путешествие во Францию — от 18 636 ₽ этим летом!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This destination image will visually represent French cuisine and culture, featuring an elegant table setting with French delicacies and wine, emphasizing gastronomy.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
